description:
Fujimura Taiga is a friend of http://anidb.net/ch1919 [Emiya Kiritsugu].
During the time after the Fourth Holy Grail War, while Taiga was still a high school student, she develops a crush on Kiritsugu, and frequently visits his house. Due to these visits, the two become friends and she often looks after his adopted son http://anidb.net/ch1904 [Emiya Shirou], who starts to see her as an older sister of sorts. Taiga becomes Shirou`s guardian after Kiritsugu`s death.
This version of her appears briefly in the last episode of http://anidb.net/a8880 [the second season of Fate/Zero], during the construction of the Emiya household. Being a skilled kendo master, Taiga appears with her trademark shinai.
name: Fujimura Taiga
